title: Google account stops syncing correctly once a day unless I restart my phone
content:
My Pixel 3a has developed this new issue whereby a specific subset of my Google account stops syncing after about a day. Specifically, my email and my Keep notes will stop syncing. I've already tried everything in the "Fix account sync issues" article, including removing and re-adding my Google account. Nothing has helped.

The only thing that works for me is restarting my phone, which I have to do once a day now. It's a very reliable workaround to the problem, but it's obviously annoying.

I contacted Project Fi support and their only advice was to factory reset the phone, which seems like an absurd next step. (I'd rather restart once a day than deal with rebuilding my phone after a reset.) Has anyone else found a solution to this?
